newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was slow in the Panhandle Thursday. Slaughter steers and heifers were $1.00 lower in light test.
Feedlots reporting light inquiry from buyers.
Sales reported on 1,700 slaughter steers and 1,700 heifers; 67,000 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 13,700 formulated and 1,300 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Slaughter Steers Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 66.00.
Slaughter Heifers Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs
Wk to Date: 67,000 Week Ago: 102,500 Year Ago: 104,800
